pullrequest.title: Adding keyboard_teleop and minor adjustments to walking action server

content.raw:
I've modified the CMakeLists.txt to include in install targets the keyboard script. Once installed in the system, when tried to to rosrun, I see the following error:

```
#!python

  File "/usr/share/drcsim-2.2/ros/atlas_utils/scripts/keyboard_teleop.py", line 2, in <module>
    import roslib; roslib.load_manifest('AtlasActionClient')
  File "/opt/ros/fuerte/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/roslib/launcher.py", line 62, in load_manifest
    sys.path = _generate_python_path(package_name, _rospack) + sys.path
  File "/opt/ros/fuerte/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/roslib/launcher.py", line 93, in _generate_python_path
    m = rospack.get_manifest(pkg)
  File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.7/rospkg/rospack.py", line 133, in get_manifest
    return self._load_manifest(name)
  File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.7/rospkg/rospack.py", line 172, in _load_manifest
    retval = self._manifests[name] = parse_manifest_file(self.get_path(name), self._manifest_name)
  File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.7/rospkg/rospack.py", line 164, in get_path
    raise ResourceNotFound(name, ros_paths=self._ros_paths)
rospkg.common.ResourceNotFound: AtlasActionClient
```

I was unable to find the AtlasActionClient in this branch, did I break something?
content.html:
I've modified the CMakeLists.txt to include in install targets the keyboard script. Once installed in the system, when tried to to rosrun, I see the following error:

  File "/usr/share/drcsim-2.2/ros/atlas_utils/scripts/keyboard_teleop.py", line 2, in <module>
    import roslib; roslib.load_manifest('AtlasActionClient')
  File "/opt/ros/fuerte/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/roslib/launcher.py", line 62, in load_manifest
    sys.path = _generate_python_path(package_name, _rospack) + sys.path
  File "/opt/ros/fuerte/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/roslib/launcher.py", line 93, in _generate_python_path
    m = rospack.get_manifest(pkg)
  File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.7/rospkg/rospack.py", line 133, in get_manifest
    return self._load_manifest(name)
  File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.7/rospkg/rospack.py", line 172, in _load_manifest
    retval = self._manifests[name] = parse_manifest_file(self.get_path(name), self._manifest_name)
  File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.7/rospkg/rospack.py", line 164, in get_path
    raise ResourceNotFound(name, ros_paths=self._ros_paths)
rospkg.common.ResourceNotFound: AtlasActionClient

I was unable to find the AtlasActionClient in this branch, did I break something?
